item.title: Optimized Minimal 3D Gaussian Splatting
item.description: OMG: optimized minimal 3D Gaussian splatting, enabling fast and efficient rendering with minimal storage.

item.title: Sequence Matters: Harnessing Video Models in 3D Super-Resolution
item.description: Leveraging video models, researchers achieve state-of-the-art 3D super-resolution by generating ‘video-like’ sequences from unordered images, eliminating artifacts and computational demands.
